summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of The State of Play premium sports publication platform. All critical features are working: Homepage loads Ghost CMS articles, Razorpay payment buttons display with correct geo-based pricing ($120 international), premium article paywall functions correctly, navigation works across all pages. The previous Dashboard Razorpay import error from iteration_1 has been fixed.
passed_tests: Homepage loads with articles from Ghost CMS (7 article cards displayed)
Geo pricing displays correctly ($120 for international users via /api/geo/location)
Signup page shows Razorpay payment button with correct international button ID (pl_ROAIM0inFWbpC2)
Clicking Razorpay button opens payment modal with correct price ($120.00)
Premium article (india-pakistan-t20-world-cup-forfeit) loads correctly with preview content
Paywall shows on premium articles with 'Subscribe to unlock this story' message
Paywall shows Razorpay subscribe button that opens payment modal
Login page accepts email and shows magic link instructions
Navigation between all pages works (Home, State of Play, Left Field, About, Contact, Login)
The Left Field page loads 10 Substack articles via /api/substack/feed
State of Play page shows premium articles with PREMIUM badges
Dashboard correctly redirects to login when not authenticated
No React runtime errors (previous iteration_1 Razorpay import error fixed)
test_credentials: None required - using public Ghost CMS API
